headline: American Electric Power: Growth Initiatives Could Lead To Attractive Returns
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. remains a solid long-term buy with robust dividend growth & investment plans. Read more on AEP stock here.

headline: AEP (AEP) Margin Expansion Challenges Slow Growth Narratives With 38.8% Earnings Acceleration
summary: American Electric Power Company (AEP) delivered annual earnings growth of 8.2% over the last five years, with a major acceleration to 38.8% growth in the most recent year. Net profit margins improved to 17.2% from 13.5%, and EPS expansion outpaced earlier trends, highlighting sharper profitability. Looking ahead, management forecasts earnings to grow at about 7% per year, with revenue growth expected at 6.8% per year. Both are pacing below the broader US market’s forecast. As margins and...
